name: inspmail
description: Full-stack email analysis system with IMAP monitoring and header analysis

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && cp env.example .env && echo 'Backend environment file created. Please edit .env with your configuration.'
scripts.setup:frontend: cd frontend && cp env.example .env.local && echo 'Frontend environment file created. Please edit .env.local with your configuration.'

author: InspMail Team
